summary.span: Presents Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) content in a Win32 window.

span.span: Presents Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) content in a Win32 window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個類別的許多成員處於無法使用的網際網路安全性區域。Many members of this class are unavailable in the Internet security zone. 會實作[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]視窗中可包含[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]內容。An implements a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window that can contain [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]會排列在視窗中的內容，進行測量，並呈現; 而是互動式輸入。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content in the window is arranged, measured, and rendered; and is interactive to input. 因為專為與交互操作[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]，這個類別會公開數個低階[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]功能。Because the is specifically designed to interoperate with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)], this class exposes several low-level [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] features. 您可以使用這個類別來執行下列作業：You can use this class to do the following: - 指定的視窗樣式，視窗類別樣式，並延伸視窗樣式。Specify window styles, window class styles, and extended window styles. - 將連結的視窗程序。Hook the window procedure. - 提供存取權的視窗控制代碼 (HWND)。Provide access to the window handle (HWND). - 終結視窗。Destroy the window. 類別專為一般的互通性，而且不是受管理的 HWND 包裝函式。The class is designed for general interoperability and is not designed as a managed HWND wrapper. 一般情況下，它不會提供受管理的方法，以操作屬性來檢查其狀態的視窗。In general, it does not provide managed methods for manipulating the window or properties for inspecting its state. 相反地，類別提供存取權[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]視窗控制代碼 (HWND) 透過屬性，可以透過 PInvoke 技術傳[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]才能操作視窗。Instead, the class provides access to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window handle (HWND) through the property, which can be passed by means of PInvoke techniques to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in order to manipulate the window. **建構****Construction** 許多層面只能在建構時指定。Many aspects of the can only be specified at construction time. 若要建立，先建立結構，並填入所需的參數。To create an , first create an structure and populate it with the desired parameters. 這些參數包括：These parameters include the following: - 類別、 視窗和延伸的視窗樣式。The class, window, and extended window styles. 若要變更樣式 視窗建立之後，您必須使用 PInvoke。You must use PInvoke to change the styles after the window is created. 建立視窗之後，就可以變更並非所有的樣式。Not all styles can be changed after the window is created. 請參閱[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]之前變更視窗樣式的文件。Consult the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] documentation before changing window styles. - 視窗的初始位置。The initial position of the window. - 初始大小的視窗中，包含指定大小，或應該從決定的大小決定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]內容。The initial size of the window, which includes whether the size is specified or should be determined from the determined size of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content. - 父視窗。The parent window. - 来包含在視窗程序鏈結中。The to include in the window procedure chain. 如果您在建構階段指定攔截程序，它會接收視窗的所有訊息。If you specify a hook at construction time, it receives all messages for the window. 您可以使用視窗建立之後新增勾點。You can use to add a hook after the window is created. - 透明度設定。The transparency settings. 最上層的視窗可以設定為根據的每一像素透明度桌面上其他視窗與混合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]內容。A top-level window can be configured to blend with the other windows on the desktop according to the per-pixel transparency of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content. 若要啟用此功能，將中的屬性至`true`。To enable this, set the property in the to `true`. 這個屬性只能指定，在建構階段，並只能透過建構函式簽章，而且加諸的幾項限制。This property can only be specified at construction time, and only through the constructor signature, and it imposes several limitations. 您可以填入後結構，將它傳遞給建構函式。After you populate the structure, pass it to the constructor for the . **物件存留期****Object Lifetime** 為一般[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]物件，與它的存留期由記憶體回收行程。An is a regular [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, and its lifetime is managed by the garbage collector. 因為表示 unmanaged 的資源，實作。Because the represents an unmanaged resource, implements . 以同步方式呼叫立即終結[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]視窗中，如果是從擁有者執行緒呼叫。Synchronously calling immediately destroys the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window if called from the owner thread. 如果從另一個執行緒呼叫，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]視窗終結時以非同步的方式。If called from another thread, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window is destroyed asynchronously. 呼叫明確地從之間互通性的程式碼可能需要的特定互通案例。Calling explicitly from the interoperating code might be necessary for certain interoperation scenarios. **視窗程序****Window Procedures** 類別會實作自己的視窗程序。The class implements its own window procedure. 這個視窗程序是用來處理重要的視窗訊息，例如與相關配置、 呈現和輸入。This window procedure is used to process important window messages, such as those related to layout, rendering, and input. 不過，您也可以攔截的視窗程序供自己使用。However, you can also hook the window procedure for your own use. 您也可以設定在建構期間指定您自己的攔截屬性，或者您也可以使用和新增和移除攔截程序之後建立的視窗。You can specify your own hook during construction by setting the property, or you can also use and to add and remove hooks after the window is created. 後進先出順序排列，這可讓您攔截程序來執行內建處理之前會呼叫攔截程序。The hooks are called by last-in first-out order, which enables your hooks to execute before the built-in processing. 實際的攔截程序所持有的弱式參考。The actual hooks are held by a weak reference. 因此，請確定您管理您的攔截程序委派的存留期。Therefore, make sure that you manage the lifetime of your hook delegate. 如需詳細資訊和其他互通的類別，請參閱[WPF 和 Win32 交互操作](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md)。For more information about and other interoperation classes, see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md). 請注意如何建構函式採用類似的參數的參數[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]函式，如[CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=98462)。Notice how the constructors for take parameters that resemble the parameters for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] functions such as [CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=98462). 縮放轉換應該不會套用到的。Scale transformations should not be applied to the of an . 請參閱備註。See Remarks for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 網際網路安全性區域中，不可以使用這個方法。This method is not available in the Internet security zone. 此建構函式簽章可能在某些情況下，更方便，因為預設的結構包含一些適當的初始預設值。This constructor signature might be more convenient in certain situations, because the default structure contains some appropriate initial default values. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您使用此簽章時，不會使用預設建構函式來建構結構`parameters`值。If you use this signature, do not use the default constructor to construct the structure for the `parameters` value. 您必須使用建構函式，可讓您指定 [初始] 視窗的名稱。You must use the constructor that enables you to specify an initial window name. 如果您使用預設建構函式，並建立，不會顯示因為初始的視窗名稱建構的條件，就表示 HWND。If you use the default constructor and create an with it, that does not display because an initial window name is a construction requirement for the represented HWND.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立時，這個值會設定藉由設定參數。This value is set when you create the by setting the parameter. 預設值取決於屬性。The default value is determined by the property.

summary.span: Adds an event handler that receives all window messages.

span.span: Adds an event handler that receives all window messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 網際網路安全性區域中，不可以使用這個方法。This method is not available in the Internet security zone. 大部分[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]訊息的觸達有近似[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]相等。Most [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] messages that reach the have an approximate [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] equivalent. 您使用若要處理其中訊息方塊沒有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]相等。You use to handle the cases where the message has no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] equivalent. 委派類似的參數設定檔[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]主視窗程序。The delegate resembles the parameter profile of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] main window procedure. 所有的視窗訊息的主要視窗程序父視窗會收到也會轉送至委派。All window messages that the main window procedure of the parent window receives are also forwarded to the delegates. 攔截程序會呼叫它們所加入的順序。Hooks are called in the order that they were added. 如果傳回的任何攔截`handled` = `true`對於訊息，其後的勾點，以呼叫順序不會呼叫該訊息。If any hook returns `handled`=`true` for a message, the hooks after it in the call order are not called for that message.

span.span: to add handling.
Associated enumeration:

summary.span: Occurs when layout causes the to automatically resize.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 網際網路安全性區域中，不可以使用這個方法。This method is not available in the Internet security zone. 初始化相關的 HWND 的清除工作。 initiates related cleanup work for the HWND. 如果稱為透過不同於主要 UI 執行緒的執行緒，清理工作可能延後到就可以張貼到主要 UI 執行緒。If is called through a thread that is different from the main UI thread, the cleanup work may be deferred until it can be posted to the main UI thread. 呼叫明確地從之間互通性的程式碼可能需要的特定互通案例中，因為在某些互通的案例中可以產生數個參考跨互通界限可能會導致及時記憶體回收。Calling explicitly from the interoperating code might be necessary for certain interoperation scenarios, because an in some interoperation scenarios can generate several references to it across the interoperation boundaries that might prevent timely garbage collection.

span.span: Occurs when the method is called on this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前的任何資源會釋出，就會引發事件。The event is raised before any resources are released by the . 事件表示，引發事件的物件是否即將有所有參考移除。The event indicates that the object that raises the event is about to have all references to it removed. 使用而屬性，以避免呼叫兩次 （這會引發例外狀況）。Use and the property to avoid calling twice (which raises an exception).

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法無法使用。 在網際網路安全性區域中，或針對部分信任一般來說This method is not available in the Internet security zone, or for partial trust in general. 您可以使用這個方法傳回不會明確地交互操作的視窗的視窗。You can use this method to return an for a window that is not explicitly an interoperation window. 這個程序如下：The procedure for this is: 1. 建立執行個體 (提供主要做為建構函式參數)。Create a instance (providing the main as a constructor parameter). 2. 取得的值屬性，從執行個體。Get the value of the property from that instance. 3. 做為參數傳遞該 HWND 值。Pass that HWND value as a parameter to . 這個方法就很有用，如果您接著要加入一般處理視窗訊息。This technique can be useful if you then want to add general message processing to the window. 不過，每當您建立，您也必須負責終結它。However, whenever you create an , you are also responsible for destroying it. 這適用於即使應用程式的物件處置。This is true even if the object for an application is disposed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 上。For more information, see Remarks on .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化相關的 HWND 的清除工作。 initiates related cleanup work for the HWND. 如果稱為透過不同於主要 UI 執行緒的執行緒，清理工作可能延後到就可以張貼到主要 UI 執行緒。If is called through a thread that is different from the main UI thread, the cleanup work may be deferred until it can be posted to the main UI thread. 就會引發事件，而會變成`false`只要呼叫。The event is raised and the value of becomes `false` as soon as is called. 在此期間，如果您呼叫同樣地，引發例外狀況。During this time, if you call again, raises an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來連接或 視覺效果，另一個根。Use this property to connect a or another root visual to the . 縮放轉換應該不會套用到的因為這可以停用行為。Scale transformations should not be applied to the of an because this can disable behavior. 內容會縮放，但不是會封入視窗。The content will scale, but the enclosing window will not. 而不是將轉換套用至的物件，將轉換套用至物件的子元素， 。Instead of applying the transformation to the object that is the , apply the transformation to an object that is a child element of the . 您可能需要新增額外封入項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]內容，例如面板中，以提供可調整的物件。You might need to add an extra enclosing element to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content, such as a panel, in order to provide a scaleable object. 您可以新增為根視覺效果，但只為最上層視窗 （含 WS_OVERLAPPED)，而不做為子視窗。You can add a as the root visual, but only as a top-level window (with WS_OVERLAPPED), not as a child window.

public: property bool UsesPerPixelOpacity { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value that declares whether the per-pixel opacity of the source window content is respected.

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether the per-pixel opacity of the source window content is respected.

value.span: 如果系統會使用每像素的不透明度;否則， 。

span.span: if the system uses per-pixel opacity; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您啟用每一像素的不透明度時，系統不會再繪製非工作區。When you enable per-pixel opacity, the system no longer draws the non-client area. 這是因為的用途是要說明非矩形的最上層 UI，適用於在互通案例中。This is because the intended purpose of is to show non-rectangular top-level UI that works in interoperation scenarios. 因此，顯示該目的矩形的非工作區失效。Therefore, showing the rectangular non-client area defeats that purpose.
